feed.title: ParaFuGe Lab
feed.subtitle: We are a team of researchers interested in understanding how malaria parasites live and multiply within red blood cells. Our research focuses on identifying the critical functions of genes that these parasites rely on to survive in the bloodstream. We disrupt specific genes and closely study how this affects the parasite, and we do this at scale to speed up discoveries. These fascinating explorations take place at the School of Infection and Immunity, University of Glasgow.

entry.title: We’ve got modified parasites!
entry.content: The first inducible knockout lines are in! Anagha with her genomic integration PCRs!
entry.summary: The first inducible knockout lines are in! Anagha with her genomic integration PCRs!

entry.title: SHIFTiKO’s published!
entry.content: SHIFTiKO method paper is out in Nucleic Acids Research!
entry.summary: SHIFTiKO method paper is out in Nucleic Acids Research!

entry.title: DiCre strategy design protocol out!
entry.content: We wanted to codify how we design the DiCre strategy to inducibly knockout a gene, something we do often in the lab. This is mainly to guide new students and lab members. But hey why not out in protocols.io, someone might find it useful. Well done Anagha for the lab’s first DOI!
entry.summary: We wanted to codify how we design the DiCre strategy to inducibly knockout a gene, something we do often in the lab. This is mainly to guide new students and lab members. But hey why not out in protocols.io, someone might find it useful. Well done Anagha for the lab’s first DOI!

entry.title: The parasites are here!
entry.content: The parasites have migrated from London to Glasgow.. Our workhorse, the DiCre-expressing B11s are growing well!
entry.summary: The parasites have migrated from London to Glasgow.. Our workhorse, the DiCre-expressing B11s are growing well!

entry.title: Welcome Anagha!
entry.content: Anagha joins the lab as our Technician and first ParaFuGer. Welcome Anagha!
entry.summary: Anagha joins the lab as our Technician and first ParaFuGer. Welcome Anagha!
